job_tasks.justification: The job title explicitly states 'MLOps Engineer', which directly aligns with the definition of building and managing the infrastructure and pipelines required to test, deploy, monitor, and maintain ML/GenAI models and systems in production.

profile.rationale: The job title 'MLOps Engineer' indicates a role focused on the operational aspects of machine learning systems, which falls under Macro-Category A (Core Software Engineering), specifically 1.A.2. Operations & MLOps. As no tasks from Macro-Category B (GenAI Specialization) are mentioned, the role is best classified as an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer, as it's a software engineering role supporting AI/ML.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is extremely minimal, containing only a title. This lack of detail prevents a thorough analysis of job tasks, technologies, or soft skills, making the profile assignment largely inferential.
